document_api_meta.title: Search Responsible Persons
document_api_meta.env_desc:
Retrieve a list of responsible persons in the EU languages supported by TikTok Shop based on their ID or keywords.
When creating a product, pass the returned `responsible_person_id` to associate the product with the responsible person.
Target seller: Local sellers operating in EU countries

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The seller access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 0. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a344ddec3030b238fa0) to get seller access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_query_param.name: page_size
request_query_param.desc:
The number of results to be returned per page. 
Valid range: [1-100]

request_query_param.name: page_token
request_query_param.desc: An opaque token used to retrieve the next page of a paginated result set. Retrieve this value from the result of the `next_page_token` from a previous response. It is not needed for the first page.

request_body_param.name: responsible_person_ids
request_body_param.desc:
Filter results by these responsible person IDs.
Max IDs: The value of `page_size`

request_body_param.name: keyword
request_body_param.desc:
Filter results to show those that contain this keyword.
Search scope: name, local_number, email
Max length: 200 characters

**Note**: Provide either the `responsible_person_ids` or `keyword`; if both are provided, `responsible_person_ids` will take priority.

request_body_param.name: locales
request_body_param.desc:
The BCP-47 locale codes for displaying the responsible person information.
Default: The locale of the seller's registered business address.
Possible values:
- de-DE
- en-IE
- es-ES
- fr-FR
- it-IT

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

response_param.name: request_id
response_param.desc: Request log

response_param.name: data
response_param.desc: Specific return information

response_param.name: ^responsible_persons
response_param.desc: The list of responsible persons that meet the query conditions.

response_param.name: ^^id
response_param.desc: The responsible person ID in TikTok Shop.

response_param.name: ^^regional_profiles
response_param.desc: A list of contact details for the responsible person, presented in different languages for each supported EU country.

response_param.name: ^^^locale
response_param.desc:
The BCP-47 locale code representing the language used for specifying the responsible person information.
Possible values:
- de-DE
- en-IE
- es-ES
- fr-FR
- it-IT

response_param.name: ^^^name
response_param.desc:
The responsible person name.
Max length: 200 characters

response_param.name: ^^^email
response_param.desc: The email address of the responsible person.

response_param.name: ^^^phone_number
response_param.desc: The phone number of the responsible person.

response_param.name: ^^^^country_code
response_param.desc:
The country code of the phone number, prefixed by a plus `+` symbol. E.g. +353 for Ireland. Only EU country codes are allowed.
Max digits: 4

response_param.name: ^^^^local_number
response_param.desc:
The local number.
Length: 7 - 11 digits

response_param.name: ^^^address
response_param.desc: The residential address of the responsible person.

response_param.name: ^^^^street_address_line1
response_param.example: 63 Cardiff Ln, Grand Canal Dock, Dublin City, Dublin
response_param.desc:
The detailed street address of the location, including the building number, street name, district, city, province, and any relevant details.
Max length: 500 characters

response_param.name: ^^^^street_address_line2
response_param.desc:
(**Deprecated**: This field is deprecated and will return an empty string. Please refer to `street_address_line1` instead for the relevant details.)

An optional secondary line for additional address details, if necessary.
Max length: 500 characters

response_param.name: ^^^^district
response_param.desc:
(**Deprecated**: This field is deprecated and will return an empty string. Please refer to `street_address_line1` instead for the district name.)

The district name.
Max length: 500 characters

response_param.name: ^^^^city
response_param.desc:
(**Deprecated**: This field is deprecated and will return an empty string. Please refer to `street_address_line1` instead for the city name.)

The city name.
Max length: 500 characters

response_param.name: ^^^^postal_code
response_param.desc:
The postal code.
Max length: 500 characters

response_param.name: ^^^^province
response_param.desc:
(**Deprecated**: This field is deprecated and will return an empty string. Please refer to `street_address_line1` instead for the province name.)

The province, state, or region name.
Max length: 500 characters

response_param.name: ^^^^country
response_param.desc: The two letter ISO 3166 country code representing the country of the address. It must be an EU country.

response_param.name: ^total_count
response_param.desc: The number of responsible persons that meet the query conditions.

response_param.name: ^next_page_token
response_param.desc: An opaque token used to retrieve the next page of a paginated result set. Provide this value in the `page_token` parameter of your request if the current response does not return all the results.

error_code_list.msg: The number of ids is larger than page size
Operation is not supported for global seller

document_api_meta.response_body: {"code":0,"data":{"responsible_persons":[{"id":"66d3cbe4d9c8b09ddca932a7","regional_profiles":[{"locale":"en-IE","name":"John Doe","email":"john.doe@email.com","phone_number":{"country_code":"+353","local_number":"80915151"},"address":{"street_address_line1":"63 Cardiff Ln, Grand Canal Dock, Dublin City, Dublin","street_address_line2":"-","district":"-","city":"-","postal_code":"D02 HD23","province":"-","country":"IE"}}]}],"total_count":26,"next_page_token":"66d3cbe3d9c8b09ddca932a1"},"message":"Success","request_id":"202203070749000101890810281E8C70B7"}

sample_code.label: Go
Node.js
Java

scope_list.package_description: The Partner will be able to sync your product information to TikTok Shop(s). For products available in the EU markets, this also includes the information of the Responsible Persons and Manufacturer.
scope_list.auth_info: The Partner will be able to sync your product information to TikTok Shop(s). For products available in the EU markets, this also includes the information of the Responsible Persons and Manufacturer.
